document_data.caption: The Turmway, running through the [[Halondar Valley]] at the heart of [[Turmish]].
document_data.name: Halondar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Halondar''', originally called the '''Turmway''', was a road in the [[Vilhon Reach]] that stretched from [[Alaghôn]] to [[Hlondeth]].
document_data.Geography: The Halondar ran through the [[Halondar Valley]] between the [[Orsraun Mountains]] and the [[Aphrunn Mountains]] before nearly bisecting [[Turmish]]. [[Xorhun]] was a major stopping point<ref> at the end of a trail a few miles off the road.<ref>
document_data.History: The road was originally named the Turmway. In [[37 DR]], the foundation of Hlondeth marked its westernmost end.
